column4: has anyone had issues browsing their network computers after upgrading to 9.04?  I can only browse my linux machines, none of my windows machines, and cant view the 9.04 machine filesystem from other computers.
actually, might not be able to view my 9.04 cuz its an ext4 ';\ thst probably it.
Can anyone verify that 8.10 cannot view an ext4 filesystem?
yes, ext4 wasn't in the intrepid kernel.
